abstract: The parent of Dunkin’ Donuts has chosen JPMorgan Chase and Barclays Capital to lead the chain’s I.P.O., now expected this summer.
snippet: The parent of Dunkin’ Donuts has chosen JPMorgan Chase and Barclays Capital to lead the chain’s I.P.O., now expected this summer.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase and Barclays Capital have won an underwriters’ bake-off that was a little sweeter than usual.

headline.main: Dunkin’ Brands Hires JPMorgan and Barclays to Lead I.P.O.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
